creator: owe@gmx.li
text:
when Chainsaw GUI starts up, the Button named 'Toggles Scroll to Bottom' is drawn as disabled state, but 'Scroll to Bottom' is enabled when Chainsaw starts up.

This is bringing in some confusion, because you have to click it twice to bring it in sync with the actual setting.

Chainsaw version: Chainsaw V2
This should be fixed in the svn trunk version of Chainsaw, which has yet to be released.  Once it's released, we'll deploy the Web Start deployment as well.
creator: sdeboy@iname.com
